title: Riot's dictatorial restrictions on player base - Banned For Taking Ghost/Cleanse - Ozu - Legendary
body:
Creating this post out of solidarity for Ozu and all of us.

Legendary is a bully, and riot allows this behavior.

It is not tabu to talk about this. 

It is our responsibility to speak up.

Else it's next time you who has to deal with immaturity of this company.

We demand a solution instead of being repressed.

(#JusticeForOzu #LegendaryFukUp)
